resources.string: Press the play button above to generate an activation tone and begin receiving data from your TPMS sensor for processing.
Valid Binary String Not Received from TPMS; please try again
Sending Sensor Data to Fleet Cents

This application is a driver for RTL2832U based USB dongles. It is an android port of rtl_tcp. You can use it to stream raw I/Q packets over the network or locally. It could also be automatically used by third party applications as a backend for SDR.
The required action was not executed due to being not available.
There is an ongoing communication with an RTL2832U based USB dongle
The driver has been installed successfully! Please, launch your host application and it will trigger the driver automatically.
Enable advanced mode (for debug & stream to PC)
Wrong arguments were supplied! Please, check the rtl_tcp manual!
Invalid USB file descriptor passed via Java.

No compatible devices found (make sure your USB device is connected, properly powered and your phone/tablet supports USB host mode). If you don\'t think your device supports root, make sure the force root option in the driver app is NOT enabled.
Device was found but cannot be open. This may indicate that your phone/tablet needs to be rooted. If it is rooted already, then make sure you have given SU permissions to the driver.
Your Android device does not provide enough power to the dongle. You must use an externally powered USB hub or an externally powered USB OTG cable.
